Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park Blue Line
ShortDescription: 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park into the terminal due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park into the terminal due to street blockage near Irving Park Blue Line.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
